attributes.action: keep increases in road fund licence in line with inflation and to reject the chancellors outrageous 2008 budget proposals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increase in road fund licence will hit worst the poorer family who are in position to but new low emmission cars.
The Primeminister is requested to reject the 2008 budget proposals in the grounds that they are detrimental to family life.
Further no evidence has been presented that the resources and emmissions generated in manufacturing hybrid cars are less harmful than the pollutants from the combustion engine.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
